title: Black Widow denied bond & Cops: Mom leaves tots to die in hot car as ‘punishment’
itunes:title: Black Widow denied bond & Cops: Mom leaves tots to die in hot car as ‘punishment’
description:
A Florida judge rules Dalia Dippolito must sit in prison while lawyers appeal her conviction for seeking a hit man to kill her husband. Her lawyer Brian Claypool debates the case with Nancy Grace and reporter Ninette Sosa. A Texas woman faces murder charges after her 2 young children died from the heat after she allegedly left them in a car for as punishment. Psychologist Dr. Daniel Bober and reporter Paul Chambers join Nancy to discuss this case. a husband allegedly tried to frame his wife by posting a Craig's List ad seeking a hit man to kill him and reporting to police that she did it. Reporter David Lohr talks about the case.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
